title: BingX doubles down on AI with $300m bet on multi-asset trading edge
description: In a year when crypto markets trade at macro speed, BingX is betting that the next edge will come from artificial intelligence.
content:

title: India’s homegrown AI revolution: How Sarvam AI outperformed global giants in key India-Centric tasks
description: Bengaluru-based Sarvam AI is redefining Indias role in artificial intelligence by building foundational models that excel on tasks tailored for the nations linguistic diversity. In recent evaluations, its OCR tool and Indic voice synthesis systems registered performance that beat well-known systems from global players on benchmarks focused on Indian languages.

title: EU threatens Meta for blocking AI rivals from WhatsApp
description: EU competition regulators today charged Meta Platforms with breaching antitrust rules by blocking artificial intelligence rivals from its messaging service WhatsApp and threatened to impose interim measures against the US tech giant.
content:
EU competition regulators today charged Meta Platforms with breaching antitrust rules by blocking artificial intelligence rivals from its messaging service WhatsApp and threatened to impose interim measures against the US tech giant.

title: Alibaba’s overloaded AI chatbot stops issuing coupons, asks shoppers for patience
description: Alibaba’s artificial intelligence chatbot Qwen has temporarily stopped issuing coupons due to customer overload, hampering a new campaign to promote the tool’s capabilities beyond simply answering questions to assist shopping. Qwen began offering coupons to users on Friday that allow for in-app purchases from Alibaba-owned retail platforms using chatbot prompts alone.
